sub_title: Experienced Product Owner who helps by bringing structure within digitalization and innovation, and coaching (Agile) professionals by my experience
summary:
If you are stuck in digitalization, or innovation? I can help you out. Please contact me via mail@geertlinthof.nl

If you want to grow as an (Agile) professional, or Product Owner? I can help you by coaching. Please contact me via mail@geertlinthof.nl, and lets have a chat.

courses.name: Professional Scum Product Owner Advanced training (PSPO ll)
Professional Scum Product Owner training (PSPO l)

profile_positions.description:
In mijn huidige opdracht bij het ministerie van justitie en veiligheid, ben ik als senior Product Owner werkzaam voor twee teams binnen het Centraal Justitieel Incassobureau (CJIB). 

Met mijn teams ben ik verantwoordelijk van het verbeteren van bedrijfsprocessen voor de gebruikers. Deze processen bevinden zich in het hart van de strafrechtketen, waardoor er veel afhankelijkheden zijn met externe keten partners zoals het Openbaar Ministerie (OM), of de Dienst Justitionele Inrichting (DJI).

ik ben verantwoordelijk voor de realisatie van een nieuw medewerkersportaal die alle bestaande (Front End) applicaties moet gaan vervangen. Hier heb ik een eigen visie voor geschreven en dit bevindt zich momenteel in de ontwikkelfase. 

Daarnaast speel ik nog een rol in het vaststellen en neerzetten van de functie Product Owner. Momenteel nog een rol en redelijk nieuw binnen het CJIB.
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Owner a.i.

profile_positions.description: Wij laten toeristen en lokale bewoners de regio op een unieke en levensechte manier beleven. Dit doen wij door het maken van virtuele tours van bedrijven en lokale bezienswaardigheden.
profile_positions.title: Owner and Co-founder

profile_positions.description:
I wanted to do something besides my work at ING which brings me a lot of energy, and that makes impact on a larger scale. So in 2017 I enrolled myself as a freelance entrepreneur at the chamber of commerce in the Netherlands. As a consultant I advise organization on how they can improve their business model so that they become more customer centric.

Sometimes I organize workshops customer journey mapping. In just three hours I learn the trainees the basics of this methodology. During the interactive training, the trainees go step by step to their own customer journey map.
profile_positions.title: Company Owner | Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Within a business transformation program, it is my responsibility to guide several change initiative projects. Make sure that during the process a structured way of working will be applied, the correct steps are followed, stakeholders are up-to-date and that the projects succeed.

These projects are really divers, which requires different approaches. One of my projects is a Design Thinking project to develop a digital portal for customer and organization, while another project is a Lean Management project to optimize a sales process. 

Next to that it is my responsibility to set up a standardized way of working for project management. And to make sure that the people start working according this new way of working.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Change Initiatives a.i.

profile_positions.description:
As project manager I am end responsible for the execution of an innovative digitalization project. Together with 5 other (DevOps) teams we are working on the digitalization of a complex and manual (workload) customer journey. In my other role I defined a vision, and execution plan for this customer journey. Now, as a project manager I am responsible for the overall coordination of the execution, over the teams. Determining priorities (roadmap management), stakeholder management and dependency management are some of my most important tasks. With this project we make huge positive impact for our customers in sense of digitalization, and enormous impact on efficiency for ING.

Next to the role of project manager I am still end responsible for one of the teams in the role of Product Owner.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager | Central Product Owner

profile_positions.description:
It is my responsibility to coach multiple colleagues. People who are ready for the next step in their career. Within our department they get the possibility to show their capacities, and to improve their skills. Next to that I'm responsible for coaching some junior Product Owners.

It is up to me to help them during this journey and to make sure that they develop their skills as much as possible. If needed I can help them by coaching on content level as well.
profile_positions.title: Coach

profile_positions.description:
As Product Owner, I am together with my two teams responsible for a couple of end-to-end journeys within the Daily Banking and Digital First Tribe. Both teams exist out of two Customer Journey experts and 5 developers. It is my job to make sure the customer needs are translated into workable IT requirements. My main tasks are: defining a vision for our journeys, creating a plan for the realization, gathering requirements, creating and monitoring of the roadmap, and the prioritization of the work within the teams (backlog management). My most important goal is to build valuable products, processes and systems, so that we can serve our customers better and better.

I have established an uniform way of working for creating a vision. Via that approach I started and directed two projects. For two of my journeys I wanted to create a new vision for a digital journey, and therefore I set up a project team,. With this team we defined a vision, created a plan, and currently we are executing this plan, meaning building the new digital journey. I am responsible for organizing these projects. Things like, organizing, preparing and hosting workshops, board presentations and following up on actions, are some of my tasks. The defined plans have huge impact for our customers and ING. For our customer in the sense of digitalization, real time processes and they are able to do thing when and where they would like to, without the need for an employee. For the organization in the sense of way more efficiency in the internal processes.
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Owner

profile_positions.description: In this role I was working in a team with 5 Customer Journey Experts. We were responsible for directing complex projects, all with the goal to make things better for our customers. Basically you could say that I worked as a Project Manager instead of a Customer Journey Expert. These complex projects always touched upon a large part of the organization, meaning multiple tribes and boards were involved. Stakeholder management was therefore one of the most important competencies to direct these project successful. To finalize my projects I worked according a structured way of working. I always started with determining the end goal. Knowing the end goal makes it possible to create a roadmap and to determine which stakeholders you need at which moment in time.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner | Customer Journey Expert - Daily Banking

profile_positions.description:
During this period I worked in an international team, existing out of eight colleagues from the Netherlands and Belgium. We worked on the Unite program, which was focusing on the integration of ING Netherlands and the ING Belgium as one IT company. The ultimate goal was to create a digital banking platform, which could be scaled globally. The program was based upon the business concepts of companies like Spotify and Netflix. 

In this role I was mainly working as a Project Manager / Roadmanager. One of my main tasks was leading complex GAP analysis, to define the differences between the Netherlands and Belgium. Knowing these differences brings the possibility to combine the best out of both worlds into one process or service. I was working on topics like, what kind of products do we want to offer in both countries? And how do the processes, belonging to these products have to look like? First of all from the customers perspective, but also the technical feasibility. In-dept knowledge of the different markets, customers and IT landscape was crucial to do my job. Knowing where we wanted to go, I had to translate the vision into workable IT requirements, so that the development teams could start developing. Next to this, I created a lot of business cases for decision making in the board. Before I started in this role, I didn’t knew the Belgium market and customer. So understanding a new market and customer is one of the important things I learned in this job.
profile_positions.title: Prodcut Owner | Customer Journey Expert

profile_positions.description: As Customer Journey expert I was end-to-end responsible for the customer journeys. Meaning the experience of the customer during the whole journey. Focusing on the processes, products, but also the most efficient establishment of the channels. Within the Daily Banking Tribe, I was responsible for the ‘Life Events’. Within this area there were the following journeys: Deceased Management, Seizure Management and Divorce Management. My most important goal was to optimize the customer experience for these journeys. To make sure that I did the right thing, I always had to think about costs, revenues, numbers, product and process quality and customer happiness. I had to keep them in mind, while making decisions. Once I was implementing an improvement, things like risk management were really important. In the end you want to improve for the customer, but there may not be high risks for the customer or ING. This was my first role in which I had to cooperate with IT. I learned a lot about Agile working, IT development, and to understand the IT architecture.
profile_positions.title: Customer Journey Expert - Daily Banking

volunteer_experiences.description: Coachen van de jeugdtrainers binnen de voetbalclub. Door deze coaching de kwaliteit van de trainingen verhogen.
